mapper.sql: unused_id, assets_id, assets_name, unused_time, account, user_name, remark, stayplace
mapper.insert: insert into dv_assets_unused (unused_id, assets_id, assets_name, unused_time, account, user_name, remark, stayplace) values (#{unusedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unusedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stayplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into dv_assets_unused
unused_id,
assets_id,
assets_name,
unused_time,
account,
user_name,
remark,
stayplace,

mapper.update:
update dv_assets_unused
assets_id = #{assetsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assets_name = #{assetsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unused_time = #{unusedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stayplace = #{stayplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where unused_id = #{unusedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update dv_assets_unused set assets_id = #{assetsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assets_name = #{assetsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unused_time = #{unusedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stayplace = #{stayplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where unused_id = #{unusedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS january, sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS february, sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS march, sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS april, sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '5' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS may, sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '6' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS june, sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '7' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS july, sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '8' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS august, sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '9' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS september, sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '10' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS october, sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS november, sum( CASE MONTH ( unused_time ) WHEN '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS december FROM dv_assets_unused WHERE 1=1
